links.*: The Lord of the Rings (film series)

wikitext.*:
'''John Alvin''' ([[24 November|November 24]], [[1948]] - [[6 February|February 6]], [[2008]]) was a professional artist. In his long career, he has made many posters and promotional art for films such as ''[[wikipedia:Star Wars|Star Wars]]'', various [[Disney]] productions, as well as ''[[wikipedia:Blade Runner|Blade Runner]]'' and [[wikipedia:Looney Toons|Looney Toons]]. He was hired by [[New Line Cinema]] to create promotional art for [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]].
